sources.modern_edition: 1932, Kassel, Bärenreiter: Op. 24 no. 5 (separate parts, revised by Walter Upmeyer), no. 2 in L. Boccherini Ausgewählte Streichquartette

entries.notes: Op. 24 no. 2 of 1776-1778 ('opera grande') in Boccherini's autograph catalogue

continues_from_previous.notes: the numbers D. 11. 556, D. 10. 587 (score) and D. 10. 588. These copies present many inaccuracies and mistakes. Moreover, they are for the most part fragments of the quartets and not the complete works.

partial_notes: Entry 189 continues from previous page with information about manuscript copies and their issues. Entry 190 is complete on this page.
